Company: Trump Ruffin Commercial, LLC, d/b/a Trump International Hotel Las Vegas
Description: back pay award in unfair labor practices case
Info Source: Extracted from a spreadsheet obtained from the NLRB through a Freedom of Information Act request fulfilled on 5/16/2017.

Company: Trump National Golf Club Los Angeles
Court: Superior Court of State of California, County of Los Angeles
Private Litigation Case Title: LUCY MESSERSCHMIDT vs. VH PROPERTY CORPORATION

Description: The New York Attorney General announced a settlement with Trump International Hotels Management LLC d/b/a Trump Hotel Collection involving data breaches resulting in the exposure of over 70,000 credit card numbers and other personal data. The company agreed to pay $50,000 in penalties and to shore up its data security practices.
